1_1Rroqm6Dh2AqqmsUfa1EDb4LER3UxKTtT.body:
The others PC will not accept your modifications, because you don't have the keys to sign the site.

But there's an easy way to create a new site, at the left of the "Hello ZeroNet_" title in the main page, you have a menu with the "create new, empty site" option. With that, a new site will be created. After you have made your modifications you have to sign your site and publish your new site to the users.

You could "sign" and "publish" your page at the end of the site menu, the one that have the world map of users.

By the way, what's your first language?, there are some forums in other languages, maybe someone could help you there too.
